Joyful July: Celebrating Nature, Sustainability & Friendship!*

As July rolls in, it’s time to turn awareness into joyful action! Our *GoSharpener July Toolkit* is filled with zealous, hands-on activities that spark creativity, eco-consciousness and meaningful connections.

This month, we celebrate powerful global days like:

World Nature Conservation Day

International Plastic Bag Free Day

Paper Bag Day

International Day of Friendship

Each activity is designed toward nurture responsibility, creativity and care for the planet and each other.

July Toolkit Link:* https://gosharpener.com/posts/868479

Let us build a future where every action, big or small, leads to a greener, kinder world.

*Warm Regards,*

*Team GoSharpener*

“Education is the foundation upon which we build our future,” and at G D Goenka, we embody this philosophy through the Centre of Excellence Programme (COEP) 2025—a unique learning endeavour that blends creativity, critical thinking and compassion.

Spanning five dynamic days, COEP offered enriching experiences across Classes 3–5, 6–8, and 9–12.

Preparatory year students explored imagination through Digital Detox, Drill Thrill and The Goenkan Gazette.

Middle graders built adaptability with MUN, SciTech, social outreach and survival modules.

Seniors engaged in SEWA, sustainability and career-building workshops with leading institutions.

At G D Goenka, we empower future-ready, empathetic leaders.

https://www.instagram.com/reel/DKRK9KlT2FX/?igsh=MXd4aG1hN2xzeHRmeQ==

Dear Students,
Please find attached the Model Notebook for work completion.

*She Leads 2.0: Empowering Young Voices for a Better Tomorrow*

Launched on International Women’s Day, 8 March 2025, SheLeads 2.0 is Education New Zealand | Manapou ki te Ao’s flagship programme aimed at empowering young minds to think critically, creatively, and compassionately about global challenges.

We invite students studying in Grades 9–12 from across India to take part in the 100 Words Challenge—a unique opportunity to spotlight real-world issues faced by women and propose innovative, sustainable, and tech-driven solutions. This is a platform for young changemakers to express powerful ideas with clarity and impact—all in just 100 words!

*Key Details:*

Eligibility: Indian school students in Grades 9–12

Submission Deadline: Friday, 6 June 2025, by 11:59 PM IST

Choose from Three Powerful Themes:

• Tech for Good - Use technology as a force for positive change

• Business & Leadership – Shape the future of female entrepreneurship and leadership

• Sustainability – Design creative solutions for a greener, more equitable planet

For full details and to submit your application, please visit the link below:

https://forms.office.com/r/bskstainAY

This is a fantastic opportunity for students to showcase their creativity, critical thinking, and commitment to positive change—encourage them to take part!

Ngā mihi nui,

Bhupinder Kaur

Education New Zealand | Manapou ki te Ao

Jump Into June: Nurturing Minds, Nourishing the Planet!*

As June begins, it’s time to transform curiosity into action! Our *GoSharpener June Toolkit* is packed with fun filled, hands-on activities designed to ignite eco-consciousness and global awareness in the young changemakers.

This month, we shine a light on impactful days like:

World Environment Day

World Oceans Day

World Food Safety Day

World Gastronomy Day

Each activity is crafted to inspire care, creativity and commitment towards a better world.

June Toolkit Link:* https://gosharpener.com/posts/769190

Let’s empower a generation that grows with purpose and acts with heart.

*Warm Regards,*

*Team GoSharpener*

Dear Students

We are excited to announce the Python Series BootCamp organized by AI Student Community (AISC), an initiative of Intel and CBSE. This two-day online BootCamp will be held on June 7th & 8th, 2025 and is designed for absolute beginners, especially those who have yet to explore coding and Python.

Why Should Your Students Join?

Beginner-Friendly Sessions – No prior coding knowledge required

Hands-On Learning – Real-time coding exercises

Certificate of Completion from CBSE & Intel

Be Part of a 50,000+ Strong AI Community

Teachers & schools that foster maximum participation amongst their students will receive recognition from AISC.

We are reaching out to students who may not actively participate in such events due to limited exposure. As teachers, you play a key role in helping us reach your students, and encourage them to participate.

Event Details:

Dates: June 7th & 8 th 2025

Time: 5:00 to 7:00 pm (IST)

Format: Online (Free)

Target Audience: Middle & High school students (Beginners)

Bootcamp Link: https://intelaiforyouth.webex.com/intelaiforyouth/j.php?MTID=mf429461804d681dc2bf6e785f12713c7

Bootcamp details (to be shared with students): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1XH9depU5iE42-WyZrA8JVRQdnB2mkjQi/view?usp=sharing

Registration Link (1-minute registration): https://forms.gle/Z6TBinUbbqjSPHo98

(Please share this link with your students and encourage them to register.)

This is a great opportunity for students to start their AI journey, gain new skills, and become future innovators.

We look forward to your support in making this initiative a success. Let’s work together to empower our students for the future!

Warm regards,

Team IT

GDGPS

Thank you for your cooperation.

Subject: Live Streaming of School Assembly on Instagram

Dear Parents

We are pleased to inform you that a special assembly is being co hosted by the Senior School Students and Founder Principal Ms Anuradha Handa, tomorrow, May 23, and will be streamed live on the school Instagram page at 1:00 pm.

Parents who follow us on Instagram will receive a live notification once the stream begins. If you are not yet following us, you can still watch the assembly by simply visiting the school Instagram page at: https://www.instagram.com/gdgoenkaschoolsec48gurgaon/

We look forward to your virtual presence as our students take the stage with confidence and creativity.

Warm regards,
GD Goenka Public School, Sector 48, Gurugram
